channel.title: Radio Sagittarius A
channel.description:
These are a collection of tunes that i never hear at clubs or out in general because they're considered to "ecclectic". this has been an almost 2 year project for me & it's been really fun. all the friends i've made & sharing music has been incredible. alas i'm gonna take a break from it for a while. i'll come back to it eventually. in the mean time i've posted some of my favorite mixes of the last two years at soundcloud.com/tvwonder that you can download at high quality for free. other wise you can holr at me on facebook. just look up monk mallard.
enjoy!
channel.itunes:subtitle: Tunes From the Center of Winter

item.title: Light Year
item.description:
...It's been a while, yea?
let's do this.
i encourage you to email for the track listings. forgetmenaught@gmail.com
i'll be throwing a few more mixes on my soundcloud.com/tvwonder
-chea TV

item.title: Part 2: Algol The Demon Star (Binary Life)
item.description: 1: Floating Points - K&G Beat 2: Flying Lotus - RobertaFlack (Martyn’s Heart Beat Mix) 3: Reso - Hemisphere 4: Ramadanman - Don't Change For Me 5: Massive Attack - Paradise Circus (Breakage's Tight Rope Remix) 6: Falty DL - Paradise Lost 7: Starkey - Knob Twiddler 8: Joy Orbison - So Derobe 9: Relocate - Dot Dot Dash (Buraka Mix) 10: Bonobo - Eyesdown feat. Andreya Triana (Warrior 1 Remix) 11: Autopilot - Interstate (w/ LeyeMeyeD) 12: Rob Sparx - The Funk (Synkro Mix) 13: LD - Derailment 14: F - Energy Distortion 15: Joy Orbison - The Shrew Would Have Cushioned the Blow 16: S.Y.N.K.R.O. - Wonder Why 17: Shortstuff - A 18: Breakage - Open Up 19: iTAL tEK - Manhattan 20: The Glitch Mob - Between Two Points feat. Swan

item.title: Interstellar Adventures Part 1: Butterfly Nebulae (Birth)
item.description: I think this may be it. at least for a while. It's been to hard to keep up. (as i'm sure some of you may have noticed) don't want to say good bye forever but at least for now. their are 4 parts to this interstellar adventures. so i hope you enjoy them until i find time & inspiration. 1: Wiley Ft. J2K & Jodie Connor - Electric Boogaloo (Hudson Mohawke Remix) 2: Diplo - Diplo Rhythm (ft. Pantera Os Danadinhos, Vybz Kartel, Sandra Melody) 3: Modeselektor - Silikon (Sirius Mo rmx) 4: Kid Sister - Right Hand Hi (Riton Vocal Rub) 5: L-Vis 1990 - Zahonda (Greena Remix) 6: DJ Mujava - Township Funk (Sinden Remix) 7: Cosmin TRG - Twilight Riddim 8: Buraka Som Sistema - IC19 9: Egyptrixx - Battle For North America 10: MJ Cole Feat. Serocee - AO (Zed Bias Wind Up Mix) 11: Boris Dlugosch - Bangkok (Roska Remix) 12: Buraka Som Sistema - A Morte do Sonic 13: M.I.A. - Bucky Done Gun 14: Buraka Som Sistema - General 15: Egyptrixx - Phones 16: M.I.A. - XXXO (Riton ReRub) 17: Hackman - Always 18: Boy 8-Bit - Baltic Pine (Run Hide Survive Remix) on a side note i've been slowly updating my soudcloud. posting the best mixes (in my opinion) of the last year & a half & they're all downloadable for free in premium quality. knock them in your pajama jams, son! soundcloud.com/tvwonder
item.dc:creator: TV Wonder
item.itunes:summary:
I think this may be it. at least for a while. It's been to hard to keep up. (as i'm sure some of you may have noticed) don't want to say good bye forever but at least for now.
their are 4 parts to this interstellar adventures. so i hope you enjoy them until i find time & inspiration.
1: Wiley Ft. J2K & Jodie Connor - Electric Boogaloo (Hudson Mohawke Remix) 2: Diplo - Diplo Rhythm (ft. Pantera Os Danadinhos, Vybz Kartel, Sandra Melody) 3: Modeselektor - Silikon (Sirius Mo rmx) 4: Kid Sister - Right Hand Hi (Riton Vocal Rub) 5: L-Vis 1990 - Zahonda (Greena Remix) 6: DJ Mujava - Township Funk (Sinden Remix) 7: Cosmin TRG - Twilight Riddim 8: Buraka Som Sistema - IC19 9: Egyptrixx - Battle For North America 10: MJ Cole Feat. Serocee - AO (Zed Bias Wind Up Mix) 11: Boris Dlugosch - Bangkok (Roska Remix) 12: Buraka Som Sistema - A Morte do Sonic 13: M.I.A. - Bucky Done Gun 14: Buraka Som Sistema - General 15: Egyptrixx - Phones 16: M.I.A. - XXXO (Riton ReRub) 17: Hackman - Always 18: Boy 8-Bit - Baltic Pine (Run Hide Survive Remix)
on a side note i've been slowly updating my soudcloud. posting the best mixes (in my opinion) of the last year & a half & they're all downloadable for free in premium quality. knock them in your pajama jams, son!
soundcloud.com/tvwonder
